It is created by joining or adding material to the previous part using the "JoinFeatureOperation" boolean operation. The height, width, and length of the final shape are provided in the description. The number of curves and faces in each loop are not specified in the given JSON, but should be determined by the junior CAD designer while creating the CAD model. The order of the parts is also not specified, but is inferred from their position in the JSON object. The instructions provided above are to be followed in sequence for creating each part and the final shape.</description>

Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. The object is symmetrical along its central axis.
